handlers.code:
local blue = 80 --export BLUE
local red = 80 --export RED
local floor = 25 --export GREEN


function odd(r,g,b)
    lights = {L1,L3,L5,L7,L9}
    for i=1,5 do 
        if lights[i] ~= nil then
        	lights[i].setRGBColor(r,g,b)
        	lights[i].activate()
        end
    end
    return
end

function even(r,g,b)
    lights = {L2,L4,L6,L8,L10}
    for i=1,5 do 
        if lights[i] ~= nil then
        	lights[i].setRGBColor(r,g,b)
        	lights[i].activate()
        end
    end
    return
end

-- MAIN Loop

if tick == nil then
    tick = 0
end
tick = tick + 1

if tick == 1 then
   odd(red, floor, floor)
   even(floor, floor, blue)
end

if tick == 2 then
   odd(floor, floor, blue)
   even(red, floor, floor)
   tick = 0
end

unit.hide()
local tick_speed = 0.3 --export ticker speed
unit.setTimer("n", tick_speed)

local turn_off = true --export Turn off when program board stops

if turn_off == true then
	light = {L1,L2,L3,L4,L5,L6,L7,L8,L9,L10}
	for i=1,10 do
         if light[i] ~= nil then
    		light[i].deactivate()
         end
	end
end
